resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

Thank you for supporting us and our year-long student research project we worked so hard on. 

We couldn't have done it without the continuous encouragement from our lab directors, Mr. Kosek and Ms. Galanos, and from our school, TJHSST. 

Finally, we couldn't have done it without you!

So, thank you, and we hope you enjoy our app!

All user supplied content belongs to the owner of the account for which the content was entered on or uploaded to. TicToc does not endorse, support or take responsibility for any content that is posted, uploaded or distributed by users using the TicToc applications or services. You also understand that:
 Although TicToc users have rights to content they post on TicToc services, TicToc reserves the right to publish, modify, process, copy and display the content on TicToc related sites, applications and services.
 You understand that some user supplied content on TicToc may be inaccurate, incomplete, offensive, upsetting, misleading, immature or just plain wrong. TicToc will not be held liable for any user supplied content.
 TicToc wishes to abide by all copyright laws. If you feel that content on TicToc is infringing upon your copyright, please contact us. Please include: (i) an electronic or physical signature of the person authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the copyright interest; (ii) a description of the copyrighted work that you claim has been infringed; (iii) a description of where the material that you claim is infringing is located on TicToc; (iv) your address, telephone number, and email address; (v) a written statement by you that you have a good faith belief that the disputed use is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law; (vi) a statement by you, made under penalty of perjury, that the above information in your notice is accurate and that you are the copyright owner or authorized to act on the copyright owner's behalf.

You understand that...
 We can terminate your account, disable features and/or services and/or remove content you entered on TicToc applications or services.
 TicToc collects de-identified data about our users as described in the privacy policy.
 TicToc reserves the right to terminate the TicToc applications and services at any time. We obviously don't want that to happen, but if it should then we will notify users via updates with an explanation.
